description: IM/",IT professional services on an as and when required basis of CBSA ESD’s project initiative and on-going operational requirements in the National Capital Region (NCR).
full_summary:
**Tender Notice: IM/IT Architect Services for Canada Border Services Agency**

**Tender Reference:** cb-7164-2838118

**Publication Date:** July 12, 2023

**Closing Date:** August 8, 2023, 2:00 PM Eastern Time

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Procurement Category:** SRV

**Background:**
Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) is seeking contractors to provide expert Information Management (IM)/Information Technology (IT) Architect services on an as-and-when required basis. This RFP aims to engage a Vendor to lead the Agency's transformation of its information lifecycle management processes.

**Scope of Work:**
The successful Vendor will provide IM/IT professional services to support the CBSA Enterprise Information Management Division's project initiative and ongoing operational requirements in the National Capital Region (NCR). Services will include:

* Analyzing business units' unique needs and developing targeted solutions
* Implementing a Physical-Digital System to ensure secure information management
* Providing ongoing support for digital system maintenance and upgrades
* Acting as a task authority for project initiation, identification, execution, and delivery

**Key Deliverables:**

* Providing IM/IT expertise to support CBSA's information management lifecycle processes
* Designing and implementing cost-effective solutions
* Ensuring compliance with CBSA's policies and procedures

**Terms and Conditions:**

* The RFP will be issued on an as-and-when required basis to request the Work, which may be in any of the following stages: inception, identification, in the midst of work, or delivery.
* The Vendor will be requested to submit Task Authorizations (TAs) to request the Work.

**Eligibility:**
The RFP is open to all vendors who meet the minimum Bidder qualifications and requirements as outlined in the Bidder Instruction and Bidder Information Packages.

**Instructions to Respondents:**
To participate in this RFP, Respondents must:

1. Register online at the Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) Buyandsell.gc.ca website.
2. Download the Bidder Instruction and Bidder Information Packages from the same website.
3. Review and respond to the evaluation criteria and requirements outlined in these Packages.

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Nataliya Sekret
* Email: Nataliya.Sekret@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 553-8542

**Attachments:**
The RFP
